features: SOFTENING LOTION FOR ALL SKIN TYPES: Give your body the love and care it deserves with Dove Softening Mango & Almond Butter Body Lotion for softer, smoother, healthier skin with every application
24H MOISTURE: Dove Softening body lotion envelops you in a delicious tropical scent of mango and almond butters. It provides dry skin with 24 hours of moisturization daily for softer skin
INFUSED WITH RESTORING CERAMIDE SERUM: This lotion for dry skin is made with Restoring Ceramide Serum, designed to replenish ceramides with nutrients that strengthen the skin's moisture barrier
HOW TO USE: For an indulgent treat, massage this body lotion into your skin after a bath or shower. Pay special attention to the dry areas, for softer and smoother skin that lasts
DERMATOLOGIST-APPROVED: This fast-absorbing, non-greasy, and paraben-free moisturizer provides long-lasting care for all skin types
THOUGHTFULLY MADE: Our body lotion is vegan and Dove is PETA Approved, meaning we do not test on animals, anywhere in the world
body.description: Dove believes in Body Love. That means caring for your body and showing it some love, no matter how you're feeling about it. With the new Dove Body Love collection, our hand and body lotions combine care for your skin with self-care for you. With a fast-absorbing and non-greasy formula, Dove Body Love Softening body lotion hydrates and absorbs quickly for soft, nourished skin. This body lotion is infused with restoring ceramide serum, a unique blend of ingredients designed to replenish ceramides with nutrients that strengthen the skin's moisture barrier. The body lotion's indulgent formula, blended with mango and almond butters, beautifully nourishes your skin, while its delicious tropical scent delights your senses. This skin care lotion for all skin types is dermatologist-approved, suitable for every day, and perfect for everyone. So show your body some love with this rich and creamy formula that beautifully nourishes dry skin. This body lotion provides dry skin with 24 hours of moisturization daily for softer, smoother skin. For an indulgent treat, simply massage this body lotion for dry skin, paying special attention to areas of dry skin. Try applying your body lotion after a bath or shower with our body wash, so very dry skin will have time to absorb all the nourishment it can while experiencing the body love it deserves. At Dove, our vision is of a world where beauty is a source of confidence, and not anxiety. So, we are on a mission to help the next generation of women develop a positive relationship with the way they look-reaching over ¼ of a billion young people with self-esteem education by 2030. We are also committed to a landmark new initiative as part of our 2025 commitment to reduce plastic waste; reducing over 20,500 metric tons of virgin plastic annually by making the iconic beauty bar packaging plastic-free globally; launching new 100% recycled plastic bottles; and trialing a new refillable deodorant format that reduces plastic use over time.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Our bodies tolerate a lot, from body pressures to body criticism, which is why we want to give them the love and care they deserve. New Dove Body Love Softening Body Lotion, blended with mango and almond butters, beautifully nourishes your skin while its delicious tropical scent delights your senses.

INDULGE YOUR SENSES Embrace the delicious tropical scent of mango and almond butters to delight your senses. LONG-LASTING BODY-LOVING MOISTURIZATION This body lotion provides dry skin with 24 hours of moisturization daily for softer, smoother skin. DERMATOLOGIST-APPROVED MOISTURIZER This paraben-free body lotion absorbs quickly and instantly refreshes skin with a light, non-greasy feel. TRANSFORM YOUR SKIN CARE ROUTINE INTO A SMALL ACT OF SELF-CARE Use this body lotion after a shower or bath with Dove Body Wash for softer and smoother skin.

Dove Body Love Deep Nourishment Body Lotion, 13.5 oz Dove Body Love Ultra Restorative Body Lotion, 13.5 oz Dove Body Love Glowing Body Lotion, 13.5 oz Main Benefit This nourishing body lotion provides 48-hour moisturization for skin that's soft, smooth, and as resilient as you are. This moisturizing body lotion visibly improves recurring dry skin. This pampering body lotion replenishes skin with moisture for silky soft, glowing skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love mango scent
reviews.reviewText: Bought at a good sale price to replace. A little gives a lot of foam and scent is not too strong. Feels good on dry skin. I will reorder when needed or before - good to keep well stocked. Like Dove products - they work as advertised.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Beautiful product and extremely hydrating without greasiness.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It is a great product.
reviews.reviewText: I love the way it smells. It really moisturizes your skin. I have used this product for 2 years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love smell and the way my skin feels! Only drawback, got three bottles only one pump worked. Will use on all three bottles, but what a pain.
